page.title: 12Running of Wetton/Grindon
page.content: Parish councillors deal with small problems such as holes in the roads, lighting, traffic problems and visit places if something is wrong. They meet every six weeks when they discuss planning applications and also recommend what should be done. There is a lot of committee work at Leek District Council level - Health Committee, Planning Committee (home extensions, new housing, conversions), Amenities Committee (swimming-bath, playground, sports centre), Policy and Resource (decide how money is spent). The Staffordshire County Council deal with the whole of the county including our area. They deal with education, libraries and the fire-service which is all run from Stafford. Our County Councillor is Mrs Eileen Critchlow. Our M.P. is David Knox.
